mapper.select: SELECT id, student_name, student_number, gender, class_id, user_id FROM students WHERE student_number = #{studentNumber} AND class_id = #{classId}

SELECT c.id, c.course_name, c.course_code, c.credits, c.hours as courseHours, g.score, g.semester, t.teacher_name FROM grades g JOIN courses c ON g.course_id = c.id JOIN students s ON g.student_id = s.id LEFT JOIN teaching_assignments ta ON g.course_id = ta.course_id AND s.class_id = ta.class_id LEFT JOIN teachers t ON ta.teacher_id = t.id WHERE g.student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT DISTINCT c.id, c.course_name as courseName, c.course_code as courseCode, c.credits, c.hours as courseHours, t.teacher_name as teacherName, ta.semester, ta.year FROM courses c JOIN teaching_assignments ta ON c.id = ta.course_id JOIN teachers t ON ta.teacher_id = t.id JOIN students s ON ta.class_id = s.class_id WHERE s.id = #{studentId}

SELECT s.id, s.user_id as userId, s.student_number as studentNumber, s.student_name as studentName, s.gender, s.birth_date as birthDate, s.class_id as classId, c.class_name as className FROM students s LEFT JOIN classes c ON s.class_id = c.id WHERE s.id = #{studentId}

SELECT s.*, c.class_name as className FROM students s LEFT JOIN classes c ON s.class_id = c.id
AND s.student_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{studentNumber}, '%')
AND s.student_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{studentName}, '%')
AND s.class_id = #{classId}
ORDER BY s.created_time DESC
